com.semanticMake.semanticApi.api

Class SMController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.semanticMake.semanticApi.api.SMController

  • @RestController
 @RequestMapping(value="/resources")
public class SMController
extends java.lang.Object
    REST controller responsible for handling requests and responses to the client
    Since:
    10/2017

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SMController()
      Start SMController with the URL of the Fuseki server where the ontologies will be stored

        Returns:

      • getResources

        @GetMapping(value="/getResources/{workspace}")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.util.List<SMResource>> getResources(@PathVariable
                                                                                                                                        java.lang.String workspace,
                                                                                                                                        @RequestParam
                                                                                                                                        java.lang.String propertyUri,
                                                                                                                                        @RequestParam
                                                                                                                                        java.lang.String value,
                                                                                                                                        @RequestParam
                                                                                                                                        boolean isExactly)
        Method that retorns a list of resources given one URI of hid property and his respective value
        Parameters:
        workspace - String to hold the graph name that will be passed
        propertyUri - String to hold the property URI
        value - String to hold the property value
        isExactly - Boolean usedo to determine if the passed value must be considered exactly like was passed or if must only to contain the value passed on the property
        Returns:
        Returns a ResponseEntity containing a list of SMResource

      • addAsResource

        public void addAsResource(org.apache.jena.rdf.model.Model model,
                          SMResource resource)
        Method responsible for creating a new resource according to the data passed according to the predefined ontology
